A special pre-release version of '''[[Beta 1.8]]''' was privately given to [https://youtube.com/c/hatfilms ''Hat Films''] for the creation of the official Beta 1.8 trailer.<ref>{{ytl|0PuGTIlJot0}}</ref>

== Differences from the Beta 1.8 pre-release ==
'''[[Experience]]'''
* Uses a "skill points" system.
** For every level gained, the player gets three skill points.

'''[[HUD]]'''
* Shows skill points over the experience bar.
** Also present in Creative mode.
* Does not show version number.

'''{{BiomeLink|Windswept Hills|Extreme Hills}}'''
* Don't generate with tall grass.

'''{{EnvLink|Village|Village}}'''
* Can generate in any biome.

[[File:Rose JE2.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Rose]]'''
* Still generates in the world.

'''{{EnvLink|Disk|Disk}}'''
* Don't generate, if they have even been implemented yet.</onlyinclude>
